articles.title: Ebay plans to lay off 500 employees, about 4% of its workforce - CNBC
articles.description: Ebay CEO Jamie Iannone said the company decided to do layoffs after examining the global macroeconomic environment over the past several months.
articles.content:
Ebay on Tuesday announced plans to cut 500 jobs, or about 4% of its workforce, according to a filing with the SEC.
Shares of eBay were up slightly in extended trading Tuesday.
